name: 果穂
text: ただいま戻りましたーっ！
trans: We have arrived!

name: 樹里
text: ただいまーっと……あー、さみぃ……
trans: We're back... Ahhh, it's freezing.

text: 早くあったまらねーと風邪引いちま……あれ？
trans:
If we don't warm our selves up soon, we're going to 
catch a cold. Huh?

name: 智代子
text:
ん！？　あったかくないよ！？
な、なんで！？
trans: Huh!? Why is it still so cold in here!?

name: 夏葉
text:
おかしいわね……誰もいないみたい
別の部屋にいるのかしら……？
trans:
That's strange. Nobody seems to be here. 
Maybe they're in another room?

name: 智代子
text: だ、暖房！　暖房つけないと！
trans: The heater! It hasn't been turned on yet!

name: 樹里
text: おー、悪いなチョコ。頼んだ
trans: Oh, in that case, can you turn it on for us, Choco?

text: けど……しばらくは寒い中辛抱しないとか……
trans: But still, we shouldn't stay too long in the cold.

name: 果穂
text:
何か、早く温まる裏ワザとかないでしょうか？
隠しコマンドとか！
trans:
Is there a trick to heat this place up faster?
Like maybe some sort of hidden command!

name: 智代子
text:
おおっ、探してみる！？
この辺同時押しとかしてみよっか！
trans:
Ooo, you want to try to find it!? 
Maybe if I try pressing these two buttons together!

name: 樹里
text:
お、おい！
変なボタン押して壊すなよ……！？
trans:
Hey! 
Don't go around breaking things by pressing weird buttons!

name: 智代子
text: えへへ、はーい！
trans: Ehehe, alright!

name: 凛世
text:
ふふ……
それならば……お茶を……
trans:
Fufu...
Then I shall prepare tea...

name: 果穂
text:
わあ！　凛世さんのお茶なら、ぽかぽかになれますね！
ありがとうございます、凛世さん！
trans:
Yay! If Rinze-san is making tea, then we can warm
ourselves up in no time! Thank you very much,
Rinze-san!

name: 樹里
text:
はぁー……にしても寒いな……
もうすぐ雪でも降るんじゃねーか？
trans:
Hahhh... but man, it sure is cold.
Isn't it supposed to snow soon too?

name: 夏葉
text:
確か……
何日か後に、雪の予報が出てたわね
trans:
Indeed. 
The forecast was saying that it will snow in a few days.

name: 樹里
text: え、マジかよ……
trans: Wait, seriously?

name: 果穂
text: 雪ですか！？
trans: Did you say snow!?

name: 夏葉
text:
ええ
この辺り一帯、そこそこ降るそうよ
trans:
Yes.
They've been saying that this region will be covered in it soon.

name: 果穂
text:
わああ……
雪、楽しみです！
trans:
Ahhh...
I really want to play in the snow!

name: 智代子
text:
そうだね！
せっかくなら、どっさり積もってほしいなぁ
trans:
Me too! 
If it's gonna snow soon, I really want a lot to pile up.

name: 凛世
text:
みなさま…… 
どうぞ……
trans:
Everyone...
Tea is ready...

name: 果穂
text: 凛世さん、ありがとうございます！
trans: Thank you very much Rinze-san!

name: 果穂
text: ふーっ、ふーっ……
trans: Hoo, hoo.

text: はぁ～……あったかくて、美味しいです……
trans: Haaa～ It's so hot and tasty.

name: 智代子
text:
うん……
あったまる～……
trans:
Mmm...
I'm getting warmed right up～

name: 凛世
text:
それは……
何よりです……
trans:
That makes me... 
happy to hear...

name: 凛世
text: ──お話を……遮ってしまいました……
trans: It seems that... I've interrupted your conversation...

name: 果穂
text:
……はっ、そうでした！　
あのっ、凛世さんは雪、見たいですか？
trans:
Oh yeah!
Rinze-san, do you want to see snow?

name: 凛世
trans: Snow...

name: 夏葉
text:
数日後に雪が降るって予報が出てるのよ
凛世も、雪は珍しいんじゃない？
trans:
The forecast is saying it will snow in a few days.
You haven't seen snow that often, right?

name: 凛世
text: はい……
trans: Indeed...

name: 凛世
text: ……『焙じ茶の熱しかんばし雪景色』
trans: A frozen winter scenery with hot houjicha.

name: 果穂
text:
焙じ茶……
お茶って、このお茶のことですか？
trans:
Houjicha?
Are you talking about the tea you made for us?

name: 凛世
text:
いえ……
有名な……句です……
trans:
No...
It's a famous saying...

name: 凛世
text: 雪を見ながら……焙じ茶がおいしいと……
trans: To watch the snow... while enjoying houjicha...

name: 凛世
text:
降れば……また……
お茶を淹れましょう……
trans:
If it snows...
Let us brew tea again, shall we?

name: 果穂
text:
わあ……！　雪を見ながら飲む凛世さんのお茶、
きっとスッゴく美味しいです！
trans:
Wahhh! Watching the snow while drinking Rinze-san's
tea sounds super tasty!

name: 樹里
text:
雪か～……
寒いけど……けっこー楽しみだな
trans:
Snow, huh.
It's gonna be cold, but it does sound like fun.

name: 智代子
text: うんうん、普段はできない遊びもできるし！
trans:
Uh huh. Especially since we don't get many chances
to play like this!

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ！
あたし、雪だるま作ってみたいです！
trans:
Yeah!
I really want to make a snowman!

name: 夏葉
text:
雪だるま……
果穂、ナイスアイディアだわ！
trans:
A snowman...
Kaho, that's a pretty good idea!

name: 夏葉
text: うふふ、とびきり大きな雪像も作ってみたいわね
trans:
Ufufu, I would like to try making a large snow
sculpture myself.

name: 果穂
text:
セツゾウ……？
セツゾウってなんですか？
trans:
Snow sculpture?
What do you mean by that?

name: 智代子
text:
雪で作った像のことだよ～
ちょっと待ってね、今検索するから──
trans:
It's what it sounds like: a sculpture made of snow～
Here, let me look it up for you―

name: 智代子
text: ほら！　こんな感じ
trans: See! Just like this!

name: 果穂
text: わぁ！　タワーに、車に……スゴいです！
trans: Wow! Is that a tower and car? That's so cool!

text: あっ！　ジャスティスレッドのもあります！
trans: Ahhh! There's even one of Justice Red!

name: 凛世
text: 純白の……れっど……
trans: A pure white... red color...

name: 果穂
text:
あたしも、作ってみたいです！
放課後クライマックスガールズの雪像！
trans:
I also wanna try making one!
A Hokago Climax Girls snow sculpture!

name: 樹里
text: ……え、アタシたちのか？
trans: Huh, you mean a sculpture of us?

name: 果穂
text:
はい！
決めポーズの雪像を作って、同じポーズをするんです！
trans:
Yes! I want to make them in a pose that we can then
do ourselves!

name: 夏葉
text:
うふふっ、面白そうじゃない
偉人の銅像みたいで、なんだかワクワクするわ
trans:
Ufufu, sounds interesting.
It kind of feels like making a statue of a great man.
I'm getting pumped up.

name: 樹里
text:
いや、まずはもっと簡単なものから
挑戦した方がいいんじゃねーか？　かまくらとか……
trans:
I mean, shouldn't we start with something easier though? 
Maybe something like an igloo.

name: 果穂
text:
かまくら！　山でそーなんしたヒーローが、作ってました！
吹雪の中で、風よけにするんです！
trans:
An igloo! A hero made something like that in the
mountains! It was even able to protect them even in
a blizzard.

name: 智代子
text: ヒーローでも遭難するんだね……
trans: So, heroes can be in danger themselves, huh...

name: 凛世
text: 猿も木から……落ちますゆえ……
trans: Even monkeys can fall from trees...

name: 夏葉
text:
何かを作るのもいいけれど、
雪合戦っていうのもいいんじゃないかしら
trans:
Personally, I'm down with anything.
But I really want to have a snowball fight.

name: 智代子
text:
確かに！　楽しそう！
きっとまた凛世ちゃんが意外な強さを見せてくれるね！
trans:
That definitely sounds like a lot of fun!
I bet Rinze-chan is gonna show us her hidden powers again!

name: 凛世
text:
凛世など……
まだまだ……
trans:
Rinze is...
still not quite there...

name: 智代子
text:
そんなことないよ！　凛世ちゃんなら──
いつの間にか雪玉たくさん作ってたりとかするよ！
trans:
That's not true! If it's you, 
I know you're going to have made a bunch of snowballs
before we know it!

name: 果穂
text:
凛世さんの必殺技ですね！
でも、今度こそ負けませんよ！
trans:
Rinze-san's ultimate technique!
But I definitely won't lose this time!

name: 樹里
text:
ああ
あとは個人戦をやってみるのもいいかもな……！
trans:
Same here.
We can have some 1 on 1 matches afterwards too!

name: 夏葉
text:
あら、誰が相手でも負けないわよ
アナタにも凛世にも、もちろん果穂にも智代子にもね
trans:
Oh? It doesn't matter who I face, I won't lose.
Not to you or Rinze. And of course not to Kaho or
Chiyoko.

name: 果穂
text:
えへへ！
雪が積もったら、やりたいことがいっぱいです！
trans:
Ehehe! 
There sure are a lot things we want to do in the snow!

name: 果穂
text: いーっぱい積もるといいなぁ……
trans: I hope it snows a lot...

name: 果穂
text: ゆーきやこんこ、あーられやこんこ……
trans: It's snowing, it's hailing♪

name: 果穂
text: 雪がたくさんたくさん、降りますように……！
trans: I'm hoping for lots and lots of snow!
